Overview

HackerRank for Work has an exclusive section, ‘Teams Management,’ for customers to set up teams to simplify operations involving multiple people and resources. Teams are groups of HackerRank For Work users within your organization. You can create teams based on the organization of real teams in your company.

Teams Management

Basic Team Settings - These settings include creating teams as per the organization of departments in your company to ease the division of work and responsibilities, Searching for a team, updating teams for permissible redistribution of resources, and deleting a team that is no longer needed, and so on.

Personalizing teams by setting a team logo and setting a seat allocation limit on teams.

The Teams Management section is accessible under the user icon drop-down menu on your account home page, placed at the top right corner of your screen (as shown below).

The 'Teams Management' page

Adding and Managing Team Users

Team User Settings - Several customizations are available for team users. Functionalities such as inviting new and existing users to join a team, editing user-level permissions, and sharing and revoking test access among teams and users can be used to manage team users and resources shared among them.

Additional user-level customizations include fetching a Team Member Status, Removing a member/seat from a team, Changing User License type, Activating a team member, and Transferring ownership of resources in a team.

Managing the Admin Level Permissions

The level of access and permissions provided to Company Level and Team Level Admins, users with Developer and Recruiter Licenses on a team can be easily customized. Exploring support articles such as understanding teams and users, types of licenses, and types of admins will instantiate these concepts better. There are several permissions available for every admin type that can be invoked and revoked. Explore the Modifying Permissions for Recruiters in a team, Modifying Permissions for Developers in a team, Team Admin and how to manage users, and Company Admin permissions articles to know more.

With Teams Management, you can easily organize your work and communicate with other members of your company who also use HackerRank for Work. If you are unable to find answers to your queries in our support content, feel free to reach out to us at support@hackerrank.com.
title: Getting Started with Teams Management
